categories: Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Wishan was a Duros male Jedi Master of the Jedi Order who lived during the High Republic Era. He was proficient at sculpting clay using the Force, and used his abilities to create statues. During the High Republic Era he created incense using uneti blossoms and at one point in his life attempted to teach Jabe Rann how to sculpt.

At one point, Wishan sculpted a statue of a greater krayt dragon, a giant tower, a replica Jedi Temple, and a statue of Jabe Rann as a gift to the Temple's librarian for their seventy-second birthday. Afterwards, Wishan attempted to teach Rann how to sculpt with clay using the Force by telling Rann to sculpt Wishan's likeness, but all Jabe Rann could sculpt were monsters that looked like Frog-dogs with bones in their mouths.

During the lesson, Rann managed to scare away a Padawan who attempted to steal one of Wishan's sculptures by creating a large dragon skeleton using his clay. After the incident, Wishan invited Rann to partake in a large dinner in celebration of Rann protecting Wishan's sculptures.

Sometime before the Republic Fair on Valo around 231 BBY, Wishan developed an incense from uneti blossoms which Master Stellan Gios found invaluable to use while meditating. Gios liked Wishan's incense so much that he brought some with him to Valo aboard Supreme Chancellor Lina Soh's starship, the Coruscant Dawn, and even offered to have some sent to Padawan Bell Zettifar after telling him about it.

Wishan was a portly green Duros who required seven lumps of clay to be accurately sculpted due to the fact that he had gained weight during the summer before he attempted to teach Jabe Rann how to sculpt. After witnessing Jabe Rann scare away the Padawan attempting to steal his sculptures, Wishan noted in a friendly manner that even though Rann was not a good artist, he could still keep his sculptures safe before offering to have a big feast to celebrate the occasion.

As a Force-sensitive Jedi Master, Wishan had a strong affinity with the Force, and was described as being able to sculpt anything out of dark red clay, even having enough control over the Force to give his sculpture of Jabe Rann a lightsaber the size of a toothpick. Wishan was also skilled enough to know how to manufacture his own incense from the petals of uneti blossoms.
As a Jedi, Wishan wore brown Jedi robes.
Wishan first appeared in the first episode of the children's game show Star Wars: Jedi Temple Challenge as part of an animated story authored by Cavan Scott on June 10, 2020.
